user_query: I want to surprise my parents with a special anniversary gift. Can you suggest some unique gift ideas for them and provide me with a list of romantic restaurants in their city? Also, find a local florist who can deliver a beautiful bouquet to their doorstep.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of unique gift ideas suitable for an anniversary.
Gather a list of romantic restaurants in the parents' city.
Find a local florist who offers bouquet delivery services to the specified address.
Compile the results from subtasks 1, 2, and 3 into a comprehensive gift surprise plan.
